targets.expr: min by(instance, model_name, service, engine, pod) (num_requests_running{model_name="$model", service=~"$service"})

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  `inference`.`inference_id` AS `inference_id`,
  CASE
    WHEN `maas_model_inference`.`deploy_type` = 'shared' THEN `maas_model_inference`.`name`
    ELSE `inference`.`name`
  END AS `name`,
  `maas_model_inference`.`model_inference_id` AS `mif_id`,
  `maas_model_inference`.`model_source` AS `自部署来源`,
  `maas_model_inference`.`deploy_type` AS `部署方式`,
  `maas_model_inference`.`tenant_id` AS `tenant_id`,
  `Tenant`.`name` AS `tenant_name`
FROM
  `inference`
   LEFT JOIN `maas_model_inference` AS `maas_model_inference` ON `maas_model_inference`.`paas_inference_id` = `inference`.`inference_id`
   LEFT JOIN `tenant` AS `Tenant` ON `maas_model_inference`.`tenant_id` = `Tenant`.`tenant_id`
WHERE
  (
    CONCAT(`inference`.`inference_id`, '-metric') IN ( $service '' )
  )

title: LLM 推理引擎大盘 v2
